keyword: how many calories in one reeses peanut butter cup
title: How Many Calories in One Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in one Reese's Peanut Butter Cup, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in One Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
assumptions: Standard size (21g), milk chocolate with creamy peanut butter filling, as per Hershey's product.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and manufacturer; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup contains about 105 calories and 2g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
faqs.a: Approximately 105 calories for a standard size.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
faqs.a: About 6g fat, 11g carbs (9g sugars), and 2g protein per cup.

faqs.q: Does a Reese's Cup have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0g trans fat in one standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup.

faqs.q: How much sodium in one Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
Are Reese's Cups high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one cup has about 9g sugars, mostly from chocolate and peanut butter.
